articles.author: Rafael Nam
articles.title: The week when crypto won big in America - NPR
articles.description: Congress passed the first major crypto legislation in the U.S., marking a major milestone for the digital currency sector.  And with President Trump's support, the industry plans to march on.
articles.content:
For years, the U.S. government has adopted a hands-off approach to cryptocurrencies, deeming them too dangerous for average Americans and too risky for the country's financial system.
Not anymore.
… [+6983 chars]
